name: project structure
description:
Create a new FastAPI project for a financial analysis application with the following structure:
- app/
  - api/
    - endpoints/
      - __init__.py
      - auth.py
      - projects.py
      - documents.py
      - financial.py
    - __init__.py
    - dependencies.py
  - core/
    - __init__.py
    - config.py
    - security.py
  - db/
    - __init__.py
    - base.py
    - models.py
    - session.py
  - schemas/
    - __init__.py
    - users.py
    - projects.py
    - documents.py
    - financial.py
  - services/
    - __init__.py
    - document_processor.py
    - financial_analyzer.py
  - main.py
  - requirements.txt

Include basic dependencies for FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, PyMuPDF, pandas, and JWT authentication.
